reviews.comments: Excelente lugar, muy cómodo y limpio. Tal cual las fotos. Un lugar distinto para quedarse y disfrutar de la buena decoración y espacios amplios.
La descripción de la casa que figura en el anuncio coincide con la realidad. la casa es muy tranquila y silenciosa, se duerme muy bien. Todo estuvo perfecto.

Todo estuvo perfecto! El lugar es muy bonito y las habitaciones cómodas!
Gracias Diego!

El espacio es genial. Buen gusto. Esta diseñado y pensado para sentirse bien aún teniendo poco tiempo para disfrutarlo. 

Big confortable house. Much better than a tiny old apartment.

Diego is a calm and helpful host. Thanks for everything.

Recomiendo este hospedaje. Todo fue tal cual las fotos! Buena ubicación, accesible a paradas de colectivo y buen punto de referencia, ya que está a una cuadra y media de Avenida Colón. Lugar tranquilo, limpio y muy bien equipado. Nos sentimos muy cómodos estando allí. Gracias Diego por recibirnos!

El anfitrión un profesional en la atención. La casa es amplia, luminosa, cálida, silenciosa y por sobre todas las cosas es un lugar donde uno puede andar descalzo... no hay mucho más que decir no?. Pese a compartir la casa con otros huéspedes hay un perfecto equilibrio de intimidad y convivencia. Los espacios compartidos están perfectamente equipados y hay un clima de respeto y serenidad. La ropa de cama está impecable! La ubicación ideal para quienes tenemos que acceder al centro.
La ubicación es muy buena, con bares y restaurantes cerquita, recomendable
Excelente sin duda un buen lugar

La casa es encantadora, muy acogedora y personal. Todo puesto al detalle con mucho gusto. Es un lugar tranquilo, con una ubicación perfecta a 10-15 min caminando del centro. 
La terraza y el jardín ideal.
Diego es un anfitrión atento, respetuoso y muy educado.
Mi estancia en Córdoba ha sido irrepetible! Gracias por todo!
Diego tiene una casa muy bonita y (URL HIDDEN) lado de la pza colón, donde puedes encontrar muy cerquita lo que necesites..

Mi estancia en Casa Helsinki fue formidable, la casa en general y el Berlin room me han encantado, me sentí como en casa y la hospitalidad de Diego hace la diferencia con su amabilidad y calma para atender las necesidades que tenemos quienes le visitamos. Hace de la estancia en Córdoba ciudad inolvidable. El barrio es perfecto porque se encuentra muy cerca del centro y muy bien conectado.
Altamente recomendable. Abrazo mexicano!!!
Que hermosa casa en el medio de la ciudad! Un tesoro! Lindo patio y un cuarto tan confortable. Dormi muy bien alli! Y Diego es un host muy amable y re  atento. La pasé re bien, gracias!

La casa es genial y la atención de Diego fue muy buena, desde el primer al último día. Las piezas y los demás lugares son muy cómodos y están bien diseñados. La ubicación es bastante cerca del centro, uno puede ir y volver caminando, sólo son un par de cuadras. Recomiendo totalmente hospedarse aquí.

Me encanto quedarme en Casa Helsinki! Es una casa colonial antigua con pisos originales y patios interiores que le dan mucha personalidad. Diego, el anfitrion es un ser creativo q le ha mezclado el encanto de lo tradicional con las lineas sencillas de muebles estilo sueco. La cocina en la cual los huespedes comparten da gusto por su limpieza y organizacion. Es un lugar de encuentro! Otro detalle especial es la tertulias de cine q se llevan a cabo los domingos y el maravilloso arbol de pomelos en el jardin con el cual disfrutamos el lujo de jugo fresco por la mañana!

Resulta lindo encontrarte en otro pais y conocer a gente nueva que te hace sentir como si estuvieras en tu propia casa! Asi es como nos hemos sentido. Hemos compartido largas conversaciones, bromas y comidas ricas en la preciosa cocina. La casa, de estilo rural, esta muy cerca del centro y es un paraiso para descansar y ademas dispone de todas las comodidades necesarias. Diego es un excelente anfitrion y si quereis pasar unos dias maravillosos en Cordoba os recomendamos la casa 'Helsinki' de Diego.
Diego es un propietario perfecto su casa es muy bonita y el es muy amable su casa cerca del centro de cordoba però muy tranquila y nos ha gustando muchissimo

Diego es un excelente anfitrión, atento pero respetuoso, lo que se refleja en cada rincón de su casa. Las fotografías de la casa, realizadas como profesional, realmente hacen honor al lugar. Los patios con zonas verdes son un lujo en el centro de la ciudad. Las habitaciones son muy silenciosas y decoradas con un gusto exquisito. Diego hizo todos los muebles de la casa. Es un lugar perfecto para retomar energías tras un día ajetreado en la hermosa ciudad de Córdoba! Diego me indicó amablemente los lugares más interesantes para visitar, lugares para comer, formas de transporte, etc. Mi primera experiencia con airbnb en casa de Diego ha sido inmejorable!!
Diegos place is a gem with love to the detail. The room and showers are clean, kitchen is well equiped and there is a pretty garden to relax on hot days.

Wie freuten uns aufgrund der Bilder und Bewertungen schon sehr auf die Casa Helsinki und fühlten uns von Anfang an sehr wohl und wie zuhause. Diego ist ein feiner Typ und zurecht ein Super-Host. Wir können die Casa Helsinki wärmstens empfehlen!
No

Casa Helsinki is everything you see on the site and better even! It's spotlessly clean, the kitchen is big so you can eat comfortable and cook without tripping on other people's feet, you will have your own shelf in the fridge, the bed is comfy, the WIFI works perfectly well... it's just perfect!

We totally loved Casa Helsinki. The place is really clean and comfortable. The size of the room is perfect and the bed was great. The place is very stylish and has two great outdoor places to have a drink or enjoy breakfast. Out host, Ana, was very nice and helpful and the possibility of an early check-in after our night bus from Mendoza was very convenient. 
We would definitely recommend this place!

Casa Helsinki really is like a home away from home - it's as the pictures look: spacious, clean and welcoming, with unique little touches. We loved the garden and kitchen - and the house is well located within walking distance to everything. Our hosts were lovely and available to answer any questions we had. We would definitely stay again. Thank you!

We had a lovely stay at Casa Helsinki and found the listing exactly as described. Diego has created a very serene and peaceful house to stay, with many open living spaces to chill out in. We were at the start of our trip and enjoyed the opportunity to relax and discover Córdoba. The house is only a short stroll to the main attractions of the city and is very well decorated and maintained. Diego was a friendly and informative host and his cat is the friendliest cat I've ever met! Diego provided info about the city and even offered us dinner with his friends at the house one of our first nights and though we hadn't fully adjusted to Argentinian late eating times so had eaten earlier, we really appreciated the offer.  The day we left, we got a night bus on to Mendoza but as there was no other guest staying in our room that night, we were allowed to keep the room until our departure which was really convenient and helpful for us. I would highly recommend Diego and Casa Helsinki for those looking for a relaxing escape from the city's hustle and bustle.

Diego is an amazing host offering great reviews and tips on what to do in Cordoba and surroundings. The house is a beauty spots where tranquility and calmness meet in the centre of Cordoba. amazing equipped kitchen with free use of spices and tools. 
5 stars place.

This was a beautiful house to have as a base for three days in the city. Diego was a helpful and polite host and the cat was a great companion as well. The home has wonderful design features and a relaxing atmosphere. Bus stops all around the square, minutes away from the house and it was 25-30 minutes walk to the main square in San Martin. Lots of historic buildings and churches close by as well. We would definitely stay there again! :)

Casa Helsinki was a great choice for my first AirB&B experience. The Berlin room has the most comfortable bed I had while traveling. I especially appreciate that he had an electric adapter for all sorts of plugs. Water pressure was amazing and the whole house had character.  I wish I could have stayed there longer.

Diego est un hôte absolument incroyable et très accueillant! J'étais tout d'abord venue pour une simple semaine avant d'héberger dans un logement pour étudiants, mais j'ai longuement hésité à y rester pour mon semestre. La maison est très agréable et extrêmement bien décorée. Une semaine de pur bonheur! Le quartier est très vivant et le reste de la ville reste accessible à pieds.
such a beautiful home! Feels so lovely to stay in and just hang out in the common areas. Would highly recommend.

Casa Helsinki is a home away from home - amazing design, lots of natural light, incredibly clean, and very comfortable. Diego was a great host, he made sure I had all the info I needed to explore the city. The home itself is a little away from the historical center, but nestled close to a gorgeous plaza and in a very nice neighborhood. The rooms are crisp & clean, so restful & relaxing. I almost extended my stay a second time! If I'm ever back in Córdoba, I will stay at CH w/ Diego again. Highly recommend this gem!!!!
Super séjour. Maison très belle, parfaitement équipée et équipé au top

Wow. The house really is as amazing as the photos make it out to be. Everything is so tastefully decorated, I absolutely loved it - it felt like I was living in my dream home!

The room was large and comfortable, with a nice wardrobe and a desk that looks out onto the courtyard where I worked during the day. It was so peaceful that I'm pretty sure I was twice as productive as usual.

The large kitchen was perfect for cooking, and there was space to store food I bought. I sat outside in the backyard with Jacinto, the handsome Siamese kitty, and read or wrote while I ate.

Diego was interesting and chatty, and was both patient with my Spanish and happy to speak in English when I couldn't make myself understood. He very generously let me use the room until 9.30pm on the day I needed to check out, because my bus left late and no one had booked the room that day.

This has got to be one of my favourite Airbnb properties. Highly recommended :)
Was amazing, felt like living in an interior design magazine for 3 days... Diego is a very chilled guy, location is superb.

Me and my friend stayed two nights in the Berlin room. We had a very pleasant stay at Casa Helsinki. We felt very comfortable and welcome. Diego helped us with nice tips for things to do in the city, and around. It is quite close to the city centre, a nice walk.
The house is super nice, and very tasteful in the decoration. We liked it very much!

We loved staying at Diegos beautiful place. You just have to feel comfortable there. Diego offers a map with the best spots around. He was always there to answer questions or to call a cab. Thanks for the great stay!

A truly great place to stay.  It was like being in an old country home with modern, comfortable design right in the city.  It was easy to get to the city's attractions and Diego was very helpful in figuring out what to do and how to do it, a thoughtful host.  The guesthouse is exactly like pictured.  The common areas are clean and lovely to spend time in, and the kitchen is well stocked for those who like to cook.  We had a super relaxing and enjoyable stay.

We met Diego the morning after our arrival as we were rather late and our son was already staying there. The apartment was on the ground floor and very roomy. Our room looked on to a small interior courtyard and there were 3 other bedrooms. No air conditioning in the flat but fans for the bedrooms. The kitchen was big and enough room for more than one resident to prepare food.  Also a shaded garden with bbq and another big table which everyone enjoyed using in the mornings for breakfast as well as late at night.  The position was very convenient just off Plaza Colon.

We had a splendid time at Diego's apartment. He is a polite, helpful and generous host, letting us know about an awesome free city tour, parties for New Year's Eve, cafés to go to among others. His apartment is beautiful, carefully designed and equipped with everything needed. We spend quite some time there, simply because it was the nicest place in town. Thank you very much, Diego.

Diego's apartment is great! Very stylish and comfortable. The neighborhood is nice. It's about a 30 minute walk to the Guemes district which is the soho equivalent of Córdoba, and where all the good restaurants and bars are. Taxis were super easy to find around the apartment's area as well. He was excellent with communication and the apartment had everything we needed. Highly recommend!
Friendly and efficient

Casa HELSINKI
Un lieu de paix à l'intérieur de la ville .
J'ai apprécié l'élégance du lieu et du (URL HIDDEN) vraie celle de la simplicité...! 
Diego par une présence discrète mais efficace veille au confort du lieu et la bonne entente entre chacun 
C'est une maison qui respire où il fait bon vivre et qui donne envie de revenir
What a wonderful place! Place is a delight with a real sense of style. Diego was welcoming on arrival and we felt right at home. Would stay again if in Córdoba.

Diego is a very good host, very nice and helpful. Diegos house is beautiful with attention to details and design. Our room was comfortable and clean, the kitchen was well equipped and nice to hang around and the bathroom was also nice and clean. The Apartment is very well situated with the city centre in walking distance. I highly recommend staying with Diego in Cordoba!

Ficar na Casa Helsinki foi uma experiência única.O Diego é uma pessoa encantadora.O quarto The Berlin Room,perfeito exatamente como descrito e a casa um lugar aconchegante que nos fazer sentir,como se estivessemos em nossa própria casa,no primeiro momento.E o Jacinto,o gato mascote da casa,é um caso  à parte.Ele nos dá as boas vindas e faz o papel de anfitrião,perfeitamente.Lindo.
Recomendo e, com toda a certeza,caso volte a Córdoba,ficarei com o Diego e sua casa tão especial.

We had a great stay here for 2 nights. Having stayed in a lot of Airbnb places, and quite a number in Argentina, Diego's beautiful guest house is absolutely stunningly good value- the decor is super tasteful, the communal spaces (garden outside, large kitchen, lots sitting rooms) are lovely, the logistics all straightforward- in short, we'd definitely stay here again, and had a brilliant time. Always a good sign when an Airbnb leaves you wanting to copy interior design ideas in your own home! Thanks Diego!
I can totally recommend Diego's house! It's well located, clean, great rooms. Diego himself is very helpful and very uncomplicated.
Staying with Diego was very good. He also provided a card for bus transportation. It all happened very safely and friendly. Highly recommended.

A minha estadia na casa de Diego foi excelente, fui muito bem recebido por sua amiga Kise, me senti como se estivesse em casa. 
A casa é muito organizada, tudo exatamente como nas fotos, limpeza impecável, ótima localização e sempre que precisei foi me dado todo o suporte por parte do anfitrião, mesmo ele estando viajando. Recomendo a todos!!! 
E  quando voltar a Córdoba sem dúvidas ficarei novamente lá!!

L'accoglienza e' stata eccezionale. Ci siamo sentiti, io e tutta la mia famiglia, perfettamente a nostro agio. Le stanze sono divise bene. Gli ambienti sono grandi, tenuti in ordine e puliti. Molto accoglienti gli spazi aperti. Arredo essenziale.

Great stay! The room was nice, the location is ideal (near the city's center, but in a quiet area), and Diego was very welcoming, as were the other guests. We even did an asado on my last day there. I was alsomallowed to leave my luggage at the house on my lastvday there, which was appreciated since I was leaving late at night. Overall, a great experience!

We loved our stay here!!! The only bad thing about it is everywhere else we stay in South America will pale in comparison :) Diego is a lovely guy and let us in very early, with fresh coffee ready in the kitchen! We ate with him and the other guests a couple of times and it was great. The house is very clean and beautifully designed as is the room, which is perfect. The location is good, it's a 15-20 min walk to the city which was fine for us and Diego gave us a great map with all the key places picked out. If you're visiting Córdoba definitely stay here, and say hi to Jacinto from us!

This was our first Air BNB experience and we can honestly say that we had such a wonderful time staying at Casa Helsinki. From the comfortable bed to the peaceful environment, this was exactly what my partner and I were looking for to get some R & R. Plus, this place was absolutely stunning. I am so happy after spending my weekend here. Diego you are awesome! We will definitely be back in the future.
Very lovely house and room! Lots of very nice personal touches to the place as well. Good location and Diego was a very nice, helpful and welcoming host. Would recommend this place to others!

Nous avons beaucoup aimé notre séjour chez Diego, l'appartement était très sympa et propre. Très bonne localisation dans un quartier très sûr de Cordoba à une petite quainzaine de minutes du centre. Diego nous a aussi bien conseillé et aidé pendant notre séjour.

The best Airbnb experience I’ve ever had. The house is calm, clean, and beautifully designed down to the last item, many of which have been built by Diego himself. The beds are unbelievably comfortable, the terraces are prefect places to work or read a book, and the location could not be more central… what more could one ask for? Diego has truly done a great job with the place and I will recommend anyone I know going to Cordoba to stay there too.

Diego was a phenomenal host and Casa Helsinki was a perfect place to stay for my two-week visit to Córdoba. Diego has created a great oasis in a busy area right in the heart of the city. 

The place is exactly the way it's represented in the photos. The wifi works like a champ, there's a nice TV with DirecTV, there's a washing machine and a nice kitchen. Diego has a great design sense and keeps the place immaculate. 

I highly recommend a stay if you're visiting Córdoba.

Diego has created an amazing atmosphere in the space he offers.  From the outside, the place looks like a normal Córdoba house.  But once you walk inside, you realize how fortunate you are to have chosen Casa Helsinki.  After reading past reviews, we went into the experience expecting to have dinner/breakfast with Diego, but he is a more of a private person which was fine for us.  Diego is very kind and warm, and his attention to detail makes you feel very taken care of.

I had a really good time at Casa Helsinki where I spent a month. The house is cosy and it has a lovely decoration. Each room is very comfortable and clean. Diego is an easygoing, helpful and very friendly person. If you are looking for a nice place and a good atmosphere to stay in Cordoba, thats the place. 

Cheers,
Ayrton
Awesome place, great location cool people and a great price, what more can you ask for

Diegos sted er fantastisk! 

Han har et stort og virkelig indbydende hus midt i Córdoba med en masse design inspiration. Værelset vi boede på var rummeligt og lækkert. Diego er ofte hjemme, men lod os hænge ud overalt i huset, og i den fine have, hvilket fik os til at føle os meget velkommen og som om det var vores eget. Han er meget easy going og en god vært, der altid havde brugbare inputs til vores spørgsmål.

Vi drak vin i haven til sent på natten en dag uden problemer.

Det var vores første oplevelse med Airbnb, og en ligeså god efterfølger bliver svær at finde :)

Rejste som par.

We were kindly welcomed by Diego to Casa Helsinky, its a oasis in Cordoba's city center. A wonderful garden with lemon & grapefruit trees and a charming skinny cat. We had a nice stay at Casa Helsinky, i would absolutly recomand it for a stay.

diego hat seine wohnung individuell und kreativ eingerichtet.
alles freundlich und sauber. küche steht den gästen ebenfalls zur verfügung.
super! sehr empfehlenswert!

Arrivée à Córdoba le 3 janvier, j'étais sensée rester chez Diego une semaine le temps de trouver un logement à long terme. Après seulement quelque jours il m'a très gentiment proposé de partager son espace avec moi et de rester 6 mois chez lui si ça me convenait. Ma réponse fut un grand oui, sans hésiter. Diego est quelqu'un d'adorable, à peine nous sommes nous rencontrés que nous avions l'impression de nous connaître depuis déjà un moment. Il est attentionné et toujours prêt à rendre service, il a beaucoup d'humour et est à la fois très calme. Il a fait de sa maison une oeuvre d'art, et est toujours ravie de la partager avec ses visiteurs. 
Après déjà un mois de cohabitation, je peux dire que je suis plus que ravie d'être restée ici, et lui suis très reconnaissante de me permettre de vivre dans ce lieu magique à ses côtés. Je recommande vivement à quiconque de passage sur Córdoba l'expérience Casa Helsinki ;) Vous ne serez pas déçus du voyage!

The appartment was very easy to find. It is just a couple of blocks from the city center. Diego was very flexible for the arrival and a cool guy. Once I drank some mate with him :)
The appartment is the nicest I went to so far. There are two small gardens, a fully equiped kitchen, bathrooms and a living room. Everything is very clean and the bed is supercomfortable. 
I recommend this place to everyone!!!

Don't go there :-)) Because every airbnb afterwards won't fit your expectations. This was by far the most comfortable, welcoming and prettiest place we've been to.

Diego designed the place himself, built almost all of the interiors and lights himself and has amazing craft and design skills. we even had to take pictures of the self designed chairs and tables. There is a lot of space to relax, so we basically spent most of the time in this amazong oasis!

Diego is an amazing host: calm, helpful and very sympatic! He provides coffee, flowers and fresh fruits and is  a nice guy to talk to.

Go and visit him and the prettiest cat in Southamerica!

Wonderful. The house itself is experience (a good one); Diego is friendly and very helpful (perhaps he even tired of our endless questions); location is great and rooms meet description. Strongly recommended.

Diego's home is a wonderful and peaceful place with a beautiful garden in the middle of cordoba! Me and my friend klaus really enjoyed to stay there. Thank you diego for everything - esspecially for answering so quickly!

This beautiful home is not to be missed. It was the highlight of our stay in Córdoba, and our favourite AirBnB we've ever stayed in.

Diego is the perfect host: relaxed and quiet enough to let you have your privacy, but also social enough to take us-- along with our fellow guests-- to his favourite bar in the city. We also found the aesthetic drew likeminded guests to the home and hand a great time hanging out together throughout our short stay.

The only downside of the home is the location, which is about a 15-20 minute walk from the city centre. But that's fairly minor. The beautiful home is worth going a little bit out of the way for.

I loved staying at Diego's house. Such a nice host and a beautiful house!!!! It was amazing how Diego made his house so cozy and peaceful, and it was very easy to find also. Definitely recomendable place to stay in Cordoba. I would love to visit again.
Diego's House is fantastic, we do had a Lovely room, very clean And everything was well prepared When we arrived. We enjoyed Our stay very much, Diego is very friendly too.

It was a pleasure staying at Casa Helsinki. The place itself is spotless, private, peaceful, charming and borders on boutique hotel territory. Diego is an five-star host, professional, friendly, welcoming and creative.  I met great people from Argentina and around the world at one of Diego's casa-cierada type events. I'd say getting to know Diego and staying at Casa Helsinki has been one of the highlights of my Argentina trip. Only a fool would pass up the opportunity to stay there.

Diego was a super nice host. I needed to get to Cordoba by night, and he welcomed me with no problem. It was super fast in email communication and response. Their home is extremely beautiful and well cared for, which makes a visit to Cordoba something else to rest and re-energize! Super recommended! I hope to return or indicate to my contact group. Thank you for everything, Diego!

Diego greeted us with a delicious afternoon tea and gave us great information about the neighbourhood, where to get a great dinner and  how to get the best out of one day in the city.
The description of the accommodation was accurate.  The extra special thing for us was the outdoor spaces, quiet and green, a lovely escape from the noisy traffic.

Diego war ein sehr herzlicher, aufmerksamer & hilfsbereiter Gastgeber
am Abend meiner Ankunft fand eine kleine Party mit selbstgemachter Pizza im Garten statt & ich wurde schon im Vorfeld dazu eingeladen - ein sehr schöner Empfang, wie man ihn wahrscheinlich nicht herzlicher finden würde außerhalb von airbnb! :) 
Diegos Haus ist Zentral in einer ruhigen Seitenstraße gelegen, zu Fuß ist man innerhalb weniger Gehminuten im Zentrum mit all seinen Bars & Restaurants, um die Ecke gibt es einen sehr schönen Ort wo ich gern verweilte in den Abendstunden, man kann ihn nicht verfehlen, es steht eine riesige Kirche an diesem Platz !
doch auch Diegos Garten läd zum verweilen ein & wenn man keine Lust hat seinen Wein allein zu trinken, bittet doch Diego um Gesellschaft & ihr findet noch einen wunderbar tiefsinnigen Gesprächspartner dazu :) 
Gerne wieder!! Danke Diego

Casa Helsinki was the perfect place to stay in Cordoba. Perfect location and the house has so much charme and many lovely places to hang out. Diego is a great host. We would definitely recommend this place.

What a wonderfull place! Very nice setting! It's something, I didn't see before. The house is well situated, so you can discover the beautiful city by foot. The atmosphere is very friendly, so you feel at home. Diego is a great host!!! I'm so happy that we had the opportunity to meet this house and such lovely guys. Muchissimas gracias y hasta siempre Diego!

We had a great time at Diegos place. The house is wonderful and he furnished the rooms so nice with lovely details. The house is clean, the garden is awesome and we felt at home from the beginning. But not only the house is pretty nice. Diego is the best host. We had self-made breakfast by Diego and fresh-made lemon-tea. If I go to Córdoba again, I´d always choose Diegos home.

It was a wonderful stay at Diego's Cas Helsinki. Like you can see on the pictures he really has an idea for design. Furniture made by himself, wonderful restorated windows, the old floor tiles. The whole house just looks amazing and I felt home very fast!
In addition to that Diego is a very great host. I could have my own time and space of privacy. But still I was invited to have dinner with his friends and him (great homemade Pizza!). We even went out together to have beer in Nueva Córdoba. 
It was such a wonderful stay and I would definitely recommend it to everybody.

Diego è stato veramente carino e accogliente nei nostri confronti. La casa è bellissima e curata nei minimi particolari. Peccato che il bagno sia in comune per il resto il posto è da consigliare vivamente!
A lovely room in a very, very nice house, centrally located in Cordoba. On top of that, Diego is a great host.
